com.company.tasks.models

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.tasks.models.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity(name="tasks")
public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a model for the task

      Task(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.util.Date dateCreated)

      This is a task constructor that contains the name, description, the date the task was created and the task finished flag
